overview:
Managing Director â€“ Investment Banking Co-Head of Technology & Telecommunications Group

Mr. Uhrig joined Raymond James & Associates in 1988, and has been involved in numerous public and private offerings, mergers and acquisitions. Earlier, Mr. Uhrig was as a certified public accountant with Price Waterhouse in Miami.

Mr. Uhrig holds a Bachelor of Science in accounting with honors from the University of Florida and earned a Master of Business Administration with distinction from the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania.

relationships.title: Managing Director, Co-Head of the Tech & Telecom Group
